article: History has some very special qualities about it. It is a 41 _ of what has happened in the past, and the really interesting thing is that much of history has been 42 _ time and again. Take for example the 49 _ of Thomas Edison and how many times he 50 _ while on the road to finally inventing the light bulb . He could be held out as an example of a person who 51 _ stopped trying.
